original_text: This is like a picture that means something for us today. It teaches us about the gifts and sacrifices that people offered to God, to worship him. When someone gave those things to God, it could not make him clean again in his mind.
korean_text: 이 장막은 현재까지의 비유니 이에 따라 드리는 예물과 제사는 섬기는 자를 그 양심상 온전하게 할 수 없나니

sentences.original_text: that means something for us today
It teaches us about the gifts
and sacrifices that people offered to God
When someone gave those things to God
it could not make him clean again
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그를 다시 깨끗하게 할 수 없었습니다
